formalpara.title: Figure 13. Rho GTPases in programmed cell death corpse engulfment by muscles.
formalpara.para: CED-10/Rac acts downstream of CDC-42 and the alpha-integrin PAT-2 in extension of cell protrusions in corpse engulfment. MIG-2/RhoG also acts upstream of CED-10/Rac along with the UNC-73/Trio GEF. This pathway likely acts in parallel to the CED-1/6/7 complex.
